title: Practice-Oriented Curriculum Based on Understanding by Design (UbD) for IoT Core Concept Comprehension

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts and internet usage experience
context.additional_context: Focus on applying IoT concepts to daily life within a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more components and operational principles of IoT systems.
Learners design a process to transform everyday problems into IoT solutions using design thinking techniques.
Learners implement simple IoT scenario simulations using block-based coding tools.
Learners analyze cross-domain cases to logically evaluate the applicability of IoT solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
